title: Calculatorenator
text: Calculator App coded in React and based on a project for freeCodeCamp Front End Development Libraries certification.

title: Angular Financial Chart
text: Using JSON data to display chart of revenue vs. cancellations.

title: Rivertide Retreats
text: Angular app. Features customized form components connecting to their Paypal ecommerce widgets.

title: Asana Project Status
text: Python script to query Asana projects and save to CSV.

title: Taconic Biosciences Health Standard Selector
text: JavaScript/CSS/HTML widget to help a researcher select the best animal model health standard assuming pathogen exclusion criteria.

title: AMNH Perissodactyls
text:
American Museum of Natural History Perissodactyls Research Site

title: Ulster County NY
text:
Ulster County Government Website

title: Taconic Biosciences Resources
text:
Searchable library of Taconic Biosciences marketing materials.

title: Cross Valley Health and Medicine
text: Custom Bootstrap based WordPress theme. Includes accessibility enhancements and Spanish/English language translation.
